title: 'Used and dirty suit received'
body: I had ordered this to wear on my bffs wedding and was so excited to see the design and was looking fwd to have this look, however thank you for such a big mood off by sending used suit which has clear stains on neck, shoulders and many folds. The time frame of exchanging and getting it back will not be useful for me now. Wasted alot of time in this. Favoroski you really need a good quality checks. I saw similer comments now that has been added from last 3 years complaining about getting used dirty suit.  Talking about quality, it's not that thick or cloth dosent feel premium, however at given price, can't complaint much. I didn't wear it or even tried this due to its dirtyness, so no idea about it's sturdyness or aftwewash effects.  Good luck if you are selecting this suit for your main occasion.

title: 'Worth the money spent'
body: I ordered two tux jackets black and white. Both were delivered early to me. They fit perfectly and feel so light. Total value for money and worth the wait. Don't think twice. Go ahead and pick up a tux. It's totally worth it.

title: 'Honest Review'
body: 'Fir the price the fabric is ok. But if you are not a tall person then you will find this blazer too long for you. I\'m 5\'8"and ordered 44 as well as 42 sizes (exchanged). But none of them gave me satisfactory fit. These blazers are for tall people. If you are more than 5\'10" it may fit you in length. For me it was very close to knees.'
